product_name: Sherpani Petal Mini Cross-Body Purse - Women's
long_description: The Petal Mini Cross-Body Purse from Sherpani is made from natural-fiber cotton canvas with soft faux-leather trim. It's decorated with original printed artwork by artist Cathy Nichols. Magnetic-closure flap gives way to a zip-close pocket and a main compartment with credit-card slots. Artwork is polyurethane-coated for scratch resistance. Lightly embossed lining enhances canvas exterior; external I.D. tag has matching artwork. Sherpani Petal Mini Cross-Body Purse has an adjustable, heavy-duty cotton webbing shoulder strap and vintage-look hardware.
short_description: The Petal Mini Cross-Body Purse from Sherpani is made from natural-fiber cotton canvas with soft faux-leather trim. It's decorated with original printed artwork by artist Cathy Nichols.
